name: Outbreak: Lost Hope
description: A mother desperately struggles against the undead and searches for her lost daughter in this hardcore survival horror nightmare.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Hardware Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
